title: Orleans Parish Prison Emergency Evacuation Plan (Orleans Parish Sheriff's Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting documents surrounding the Orleans Parish Prison's emergency evacuation plan. My request applies to records maintained by or within the possession, custody or control of Orleans Parish, including, but not limited to, the Orleans Parish Sheriff's Department and the New Orleans Police Department as well as any authorized sub-entity, agent, vendor or contractor. All guides, manuals, standard operating procedures (SOPs) and other written policies, procedures or directives related to emergency evacuations of the people incarcerated in the jail in the event of fire, flooding, disease, or any other disaster, including all interim, draft or superseded versions, are included in this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Hannah Riley

title: Dallas County Jail Emergency Evacuation Plan (Dallas County Sheriff's Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting documents surrounding the Dallas County Jail's emergency evacuation plan. My request applies to records maintained by or within the possession, custody or control of Dallas County, including, but not limited to, the Dallas County Sheriff's Office and the Dallas Police Department as well as any authorized sub-entity, agent, vendor or contractor. All guides, manuals, standard operating procedures (SOPs) and other written policies, procedures or directives related to emergency evacuations of the people incarcerated in the jail in the event of fire, flooding, disease, or any other disaster, including all interim, draft or superseded versions, are included in this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Hannah Riley
